mapper.select: /* 특정 자격증 일정 조회 */ SELECT ld.ld_code ,ld.li_code ,ld.ld_period ,ld.ld_date ,ld.ld_acceptance_date ,ld.ld_cost ,ld.ld_reg_id ,ld.ld_reg_datetime FROM license_date AS ld WHERE ld.ld_code = #{ldCode};
mapper.insert: /* 자격증 일정 등록 */ INSERT INTO license_date ( ld_code ,li_code ,ld_period ,ld_date ,ld_acceptance_date ,ld_cost ,ld_reg_id ,ld_reg_datetime) VALUES (#{ldCode}, #{liCode}, #{ldPeriod}, #{ldDate}, #{ldAcceptanceDate}, #{ldCost}, #{ldRegId}, CURDATE());
